channel.title: Logging Out
channel.description:
Another small question. How do I make it so that you cannot log out while in combat?
I have searched the Tutorials section and I can't find anything - any help?

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

ok then…
Search:

void logout()

Then something along the lines of:

if (isFighting)
{
sendMessage("You cant logout hoe.");
return;
}

That help at all?
Note that your boolean might not be isFighting ok?

Read full topic

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @Demise Demise
item.description:
@Demise wrote:

I don’t answer your question.
I just want a simple code that makes it say something like “You cannot log out while in Combat!” when you’re in combat and you press the log out button.

How much simpler could it be?

Read full topic

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

Bro give us some more info.
For example, whats your wild method, like inwild or what?
Then i’ll help.

Read full topic

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @Demise Demise
item.description:
@Demise wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:2, topic:250412”]find the action button of the logout button, and make an if statement for a timer whilst in combat.

I don’t know the action button for the logoff button, otherwise i’d help you out more.[/quote]

Okay, any one else?

Read full topic
